You like to head out into the forest to have space to yourself. You enjoy exploring the woods. The forest outside of Chegckle is a completely different world. The forest floor doesn't see a lot of sun due to the trees, so on hot days the forest is a nice place to escape to.

One day, as you're out strolling in the woods you see what seems to be an odd looking stone box. As you get closer you see it has intricate carvings of elaborate desings. You brush away the plants revealing an odd stone treasure chest. It is worn from the elements and seems to have been waiting under the brush for a while.

The lid seems to be cracked slightly, and you might be able to open the chest.

Open the chestIgnore it
